transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan boliye madam.
Executive: Good morning sir, Anju baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se account manager, kaise hain sir?
Customer: Haan boliye boliye.
Executive: Sir wo aapke us din call aayi thi pata hi nahi chal paya mujhe call aapki miss ho gayi. Baat karni thi aapse thoda catalog ko lekar abhi free hain aap baat kar payenge?
Customer: Madam kal theek hai parso aapko call kiye the market mein market mein thoda busy chal raha hai.
Executive: Sir actually Saturday Sunday na off off tha to is vajah se aapse baat nahi ho payi pata bhi nahi chal paya aapki call kab aayi is chakkar mein.
Executive: To abhi kahan hai aap free hai thoda ya market vagaira mein hai?
Customer: Madam market mein madam.
Executive: Aap kab tak free ho jayenge?
Customer: 1 2 baje 1 2 baje madam.
Executive: Ek 2 baje tak theek hai fir main aapse ek ya 2 baje ko ek bar call karke discuss kar leti hu but please call aap receive kar lena sir theek hai 5 minute chahiye bas aapse jyada samay nahi chahiye theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko fir main ek 2 baje tak call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's call was missed.

- Wants to discuss catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back at 1-2 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back at 1-2 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, call, follow up
